# Workshop

## Dates

16 May - 19 May 2023

## Location

<a href="https://biosphere2.org/">Biosphere2</a>, University of Arizona outside of Tucson, AZ.

## Travel

### Airports

Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX)
- a little over an hr from the workshop venue

Tuson International Airport (TUS)
